quotes: When Salim assumed the leadership of the OAU as its secretary-general in 1989,
The declaration adopted by the OAU summit in the same year outlined most of the priorities now contained in the African Peace and Security Architecture and the African Governance Architecture.

His view was that when our forebears met in Addis Ababa in May 1963, they had not intended the non-interference clause of the OAU Charter to mean there should be no interference irrespective of the situation.

organizations.name: OAU
quotes: When Salim assumed the leadership of the OAU as its secretary-general in 1989,
As OAU secretary-general, Salim worked tirelessly to help our leaders lay the legal foundation that led to the institutional transformation of the OAU into the African Union (AU)
he became critical of the way that the OAU principle of non-interference in the internal affairs of member states hampered continental institutions
The AU Constitutive Act still maintains the non-interference clause among its core principles.

organizations.name: African Union (AU)
quotes: As OAU secretary-general, Salim worked tirelessly to help our leaders lay the legal foundation that led to the institutional transformation of the OAU into the African Union (AU)

roles.title: secretary-general
quotes: When Salim assumed the leadership of the OAU as its secretary-general in 1989,
As OAU secretary-general, Salim worked tirelessly to help our leaders lay the legal foundation that led to the institutional transformation of the OAU into the African Union (AU)
during his tenure as OAU secretary-general, he became critical of the way that the OAU principle of non-interference in the internal affairs of member states hampered continental institutions

His view was that when our forebears met in Addis Ababa in May 1963, they had not intended the non-interference clause of the OAU Charter to mean there should be no interference irrespective of the situation.
